revised_title: The Role of Pseudonuclei in Immature Ovarian Ova
tldr: The author discusses the presence of peculiar bodies called pseudonuclei in immature ovarian ova of birds. They mention the findings of another researcher, Rauber, and express their disagreement with Rauber's opinion on the origin of these bodies. The author also clarifies the distinction between different types of tubes found in the ovary.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Reproductive Biology
